price: 46. vers Pharaon et son assemblée de notables, qui se montrèrent dédaigneux et hautains.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman ʿālīna
